Calculate daily cases and daily deaths from Philippines COVID-19 Data Drop

Source: R/02-ph_calculate_cases.R
ph_calculate_cases.Rd

Calculate daily cases and daily deaths from Philippines COVID-19 Data Drop

ph_calculate_cases(date = Sys.Date())

Arguments

date

Date in <YYYY-MM-DD> format; This is the date up to which extracted data reports to. Default is current date (Sys.Date())

Value

A data.frame with calculated number of cases per and number of deaths per day with structure consistent with CoMo model data structure requirements.

Examples

ph_calculate_cases(date = "2020-04-17")
#>        repDate cases deaths
#> 1   2020-01-01     0      0
#> 2   2020-01-02     0      0
#> 3   2020-01-03     0      0
